<title level="1" right="Trait">[Beast](/Traits.aspx?ID=20)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 629 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A creature similar to an [animal](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) but with an Intelligence modifier of –3 or higher is usually a beast. Unlike an animal, a beast might be able to speak and reason.
